authentication.name: Authentication
authentication.description: Use third-party authentication services to sign in to your account.

google.descriptionWithoutLink: We will not have access to your personal information, only your email address and name.
google.description: You can sign in to writex.io using your Google account <avatar /> {{email}}.

facebook.descriptionWithoutLink: We will not post or share anything on your Facebook account and will not have access to your personal information, only your email address and name.
facebook.description: You can sign in to writex.io using your Facebook account <avatar /> {{email}}.

twitter.descriptionWithoutLink: We will not post or share anything on your Twitter account and will not have access to your personal information, only your email address and name.
twitter.description: You can sign in to writex.io using your Twitter account <avatar /> {{email}}.

github.descriptionWithoutLink: We will not have access to your personal information, only your email address and name.
github.description: You can sign in to writex.io using your GitHub account <avatar /> {{email}}.

profile.name: Public profile
profile.bioHint: Will be open to other members, when the sharing functionality will be implemented.
